knimeNode.name: Conformal Predictor and Classifier (Regression)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates the table with p-values for test data based on the provided calibration table.

fullDescription.intro: Calculates the table with p-values for test data based on the provided calibration table. The p-value for a class is the fraction of entries from that class in the calibration set that have a model probability less than or equal to the model probability for the record under consideration. Small p-values indicate records that are nonconforming, larger p-values indicate records that are conforming. (Reference: Vovk, V., Gammerman, A. and Shafer, G., 2005. Algorithmic learning in a random world. Springer Science & Business Media.)
fullDescription.option: A column with target column that is being predicted.
If checked all columns from input table will be also included into output table along with calibration columns.
If checked selected ID column from input table will be included into output table.

ports.inPort: Table with predictions and class probabilities. Target variable must have the same domain as the calibration table.
ports.outPort: Table with calibrated predictions and p-values.
